attributes.action: GO TO WAR WITH ISIS BEFORE IT IS TO LATE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.additional_details: GREECE, TURKEY, FRANCE, TUNISIA!.... All the killings on the news and Internet. Videos of them beheading innocent people! All the threats they are making and coming through with!!!!!!!!
attributes.background: They are terrorising the world! Everybody in most countries are scared in Europe! They are causing millions in damage. Costing millions in benefits and relocating them. They have no morals so they have no second thought about killing woman and children! How many more people will have to die?

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107116

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
